Title: Burma VJ: Reporting from a Closed Country
Actors: George W. Bush, Ko Muang, Aung San Suu Kyi
Plot: Using smuggled footage, this documentary tells the story of the 2007 protests in Burma by thousands of monks.
Country: Denmark, Sweden, Norway, UK, USA, Germany, Netherlands, Israel, Spain, Belgium, Canada
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 16 wins & 10 nominations.
